ValidationRule.description: CRIS ID required if DPI order # is entered?
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Order Entry Errors', OrderManagement_DPIOrderNumber__c != '', OR( CRIS_ID_Manual__c = '', ISPICKVAL(DPI_Environment__c , '') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you enter a DPI order number, you must enter the corresponding CRIS ID and DPI Environment.
